metadata.description: Collection of plugins for Claude Code

plugins.name: agent-meeting-room
plugins.description: Tracks Claude Code sessions and agent processes in the Agent Meeting Room system

plugins.name: documentation-generator
plugins.description: Generate comprehensive project documentation through interactive dialog with templates

plugins.name: git-commit
plugins.description: Streamlined git commit and push with auto-generated commit messages

plugins.name: vue-reorder
plugins.description: Refactor Vue 3 SFCs for readability: reorder sections, organize script, improve naming
